title: Shared Happiness
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Aaah~, the breeze feels so good~. It instantly takes away all the sweat from dashing up the stairs.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah, I guess we’re already in that season. Try not to let your body get too cold, You-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Okay. You too, Dia-san. But man, the view is really nice, isn’t it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You’re right. I could look at it every day and never get tired.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I think that’s partly because you’re seeing it with someone else. Like, you can’t say “what a nice view” when you’re alone, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufufu. That might be true. I’m happy to be able to share this view with you, You-san.... Hm? I thought I heard a strange sound just now....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Wawaah, sorry! That’s my stomach rumbling~. Ehehe, I guess I’m getting kind of hungry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. Then let’s stop by somewhere on our way back. I’m actually quite hungry too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>How rare of you to suggest a detour, Dia-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Let’s just keep it between us, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
